review_data.title: The most authentic Greek food in Zurich
review_data.content: Dinner at Taverna Apollo felt like eating at home! As a Greek having lived in Zurich for 5 years, I had never come across any authentic Greek restaurants until (paradoxically) Swiss friends of mine discovered Taverna Apollo. I was a bit hesitant at first because...More

review_data.title: Friendly and delicious
review_data.content: It was not my first time there and Apollo Taverne never stops to surprise me how good the food is My recommendation are having a different set of the warm & cold mezze's. Just perfect!!!

review_data.title: Excellent!
review_data.content: Best Greek restaurant in Zurich! The service is excellent, the waiter will welcome you with a big smile and he will continue to do so during the whole stay. Food was delicious. I recommend the Greek plate as a starter (CHF 19.- for two)!! Only...More

review_data.title: Great food quality, friendly staff, everything is just perfect!
review_data.content: Very nice Greek restaurant, probably the best! Staff is very friendly! Food is very tasty! Soft Greek music is playing, nice atmosphere. Moreover, I saw Greek people eating there - this is another sign of a good Greek restaurant :-) I strongly recommend to go...More

review_data.title: As good as a Greek restaurant in Greece
review_data.content: The service is awesome, the guy serving is really friendly and the food is delicious! Don't forget to try the retsina wine.

review_data.title: small but excellent
review_data.content: simply the best greek restaurant in town not in the center of the city, in schwamendingen quarter a must to order: the homemade pikilies and of course their gyros, both absolutely delicious authentic cuisine and the prices are reasonable
